info.description: Maestro authors and executes experiences that allow non-coders the ability to define Simple Business Process without having to write code and to deploy them seamlessly without having to have development expertise
info.title: Maestro API

parameters.description: Managed Token Id registered with DS Account Server
parameters.name: mtid

parameters.description: Managed Token Secret registered with DS Account Server
parameters.name: mtsec

parameters.description: JSON payload that will be passed to the triggered workflow
parameters.name: body

201.description: Returns a workflow instance trigger URL that can be used to trigger a new instance or return to an instance in progress

404.description: Resource not found when workflow definition id or workflow instance id doesn't exist

post.description: Creates a new workflow instance after authenticating with DS Account Server
post.summary: Creates a new workflow instance after authenticating with DS Account Server

404.description: The requested resource was not found

200.description: History of workflow steps is returned

schema.description: Returns Array of Workflow Step History.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

get.description: Returns a list of step history for a workflow instance

200.description: Returns a list of workflow definitions' metadata.

get.description: Returns a list of workflow definitions' metadata.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

parameters.description: deployed workflow definition metadata object id

parameters.description: Request Body to update a workflow definition.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Returns a list of configuration instances for a workflow definition

200.description: A list of workflow instances for a workflow definition in the specified account.

schema.description: A list of workflow instances (0 or more).
